summary: More.. realistic?... Yeah shure!... as a lizzardman whit dick... human dick xD
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod created by me using other mods which do not work for my skyrim
_________________________________________________
Drachis Argonians with SoS support by T3alrose and Drachis
Drachis Argonians for SOS by Snikkmorder and Drachis
Drachis Argonians Mod by Drachis
_________________________________________________
This two aren't bad works but... in my skyrim doesn't work so... i build a better mod whit this guys mods and luego de mucho trabajo... funciono!
so I give my sincere thanks to T3alrose, Drachis and Snikkmorder
They did a great jobÂ 
Improvements:
Hands and feet nails now have (unfortunately only one hand has claws, if someone can create a mod for hands and feet have claws would be Magnificent :3)
Textures hands, genitals and feet. improved
Notes:
TFC Command Screens
Requirements:
SKSE - See Tutorial on Youtube (http://skse.silverlock.org/)
SOS - Schlongs of Skyrim 2.05.034 (http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/)
well ... it all
enjoy! ;3
author: T3alrose Snikkmorder Drachis and me
